summary: The Civil War is coming to an end, but war is brewing. The Thalmor are plotting against Skyrim, and are calling upon their allies. The Imperials and Stormcloaks have no idea what is happening.... An ancient Nord organization are the only ones who know, and are calling upon the Dragonborn....
descriptionHtml:
The Civil War is coming to an end, but war is brewing. The Thalmor are plotting against Skyrim, and are calling upon their allies. The Imperials and Stormcloaks have no idea what is happening.... An ancient Nord organization are the only ones who know, and are calling upon the Dragonborn....

V1 adds additional followers, and a secret headquarters hidden to the right of house of clan shatter-shield, at the city wall (Windhelm).

To install newer versions completely uninstall previous versions before installing.

The headquarters is glitchy
If the floor disappears, keep walking and it\'ll reappear.
author: TheUnknown07
